sentence.text: In 44 primary acral melanomas, sensitivity was 70.5% (31/44) using probe negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated 1 alone, and 59.1% (26/44) using probe set 2 alone.

In this study superoxide metabolic process exhibited sensitivity and specificity in diagnosis of acral melanoma which allows its application as an auxiliary diagnostic test in acral melanocytic tumours

Fluorescence in situ hybridisation (superoxide metabolic process) targeting specific genes has been used as an ancillary method for differential diagnosis of melanocytic tumours, but most previous studies have focused on non-acral lesions which may have genetic alterations different from acral lesions.
